column5: 👍 Looks good for Walleye in stained water. In fact, I thought I saw that bait in Limeyangler's video he just posted....lol....and yeah, Wabigoon is definitely stained..

For crappie and bass on your lake I usually do tail down as they are mostly looking up for bait...Pickerel, I do tail up as they are usually at the bottom and if the tail is down it would just drag on the bottom giving it no action...Under a bobber, either way...
That is far to specific  lol
I like my tail both ways... 😎
